short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A floating Evrybo toolbar for screen capture

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple tool you can use for bug tracking.

Create an Evrybo account, log in, and choose your to-do board. Once you do that, youâ€™ll be able to select part of the screen and create a task on Evrybo. 
A screenshot will automatically be taken and added to the newly created task.
